ai-patthana12.8:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana12.8:2.1_0: for the sake of seeing rightly.
ai-patthana12.8:3.1_1: she doesn’t give rise to confidence in some things.
ai-patthana12.8:4.1_1: nor does he give rise to form ...
ai-patthana12.8:5.1_0: nor did I for the sake of whole worldly pleasures.
ai-patthana12.8:5.1_1: or for the sake of whole worldly gain.
ai-patthana12.8:6.1_0: nor does it cause some to speak to the teaching.
ai-patthana12.8:6.1_1: and no way for some other reason.
